title: Display property not taking effect in new PDF emitter when set to 'none'
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it is not being recognized in the new PDF emitter.
OB: The display property of an item set to 'none' does not have any effect in the new PDF emitter.
EB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it should hide the item from the output in the new PDF emitter.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Add a label to the document. 2. Open the 'properties' view for the label. 3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' property to 'none' in the properties view. 4. Observe that the label is still visible in the PDF output.
